title: INPODAK Football for Toddlers 1-3, Kids Football, Footballs Size 2, Garden Game Ball, Footballs Toys Gift for Boys Girls Outdoor Lawn Beach, Orange Fox
features: [Fit for Kids] Size 2 football is a formal ball suitable for children. Measure 18.5 inches in circumference. An outdoor toy suitable for kids from 3-6 years old

[Strong Construction] The inside bladder is made of the industry-standard butyl rubber, which holds air really well and preserves the shape of the ball. The outside is machine stitched, made of synthetic leather with improved softness, bounce and durability. The football contains 32 panels for easier control, so this kids toy ball won’t cause any injuries

[Go to Outdoor] Get rid of electronics products, a cute cartoon ball is such a good choice for the kids in bad weather indoor or in yard outdoor where kids also can burn off all their excess energy. It’s great way to remove children’s focus from electronics products like phone/computer to soccer ball sports

[ Important In Kids’ Growing Up] Football sports is not only physical exercise, but also burn energy off, exercise of will and character. Kids feel happy while running and laughing to chase the rolling ball, and touching the nature in the sun. INPODAK special designs help to develop children's interest in sports at an early age

[Fantastic Ball Toys] Playing soccer ball in the yard or in the park with your lovely children, is the best way to improve the parent-child relationship, and inspire children's awareness and interest in soccer and sports. Soccer ball is one of the children's favorite toys. Go and have fun with the INPODAK super cool football
